content: will need to be behind the tail row 2 *increase in every single_crochet* repeat around 12 stitches row 3 *increase in next single_crochet single_crochet 1* repeat around 18 stitches row 4 single_crochet 18 18 stitches row 5 the back feet of the elephant are in this row single_crochet 7 6 double_crochet bobble stitch in next stitch single_crochet 3 6 double_crochet bobble stitch in next stitch single_crochet 6 18 stitches make sure that each bobble stitch is pressed to the outside of the elephant row 6 single_crochet 18 18 stitches row 7 single_crochet 1 increase single_crochet 16 19 stitches row 8 single_crochet 19 19 stitches row 9 single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 16 20 stitches row 10 single_crochet 20 20 stitches row 11 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 16 21 stitches row 12 single_crochet 21 21 stitches row 13 the front feet are in this row single_crochet 2 increase increase increase single_crochet 7 6 double_crochet bobble stitch in next stitch single_crochet 3 6 double_crochet bobble stitch in next stitch single_crochet 4 24 stitches summary of row 13 single_crochet 2 increase x 3 single_crochet 7 foot single_crochet 3 foot single_crochet 4 = 24 stitches criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-elephant row 14 this next stitch is the first ear complete all stitches in brackets in the front loop of the next single_crochet slip_stitch into the front loop chain 3 9 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet chain 1 single_crochet 9 across the next 9 single_crochet s in the front loop of the next single_crochet only chain 1 1 half_double_crochet 9 double_crochet 3 chain then slip_stitch back into the same stitch single_crochet 13 24 stitches summary of row 14 ear single_crochet 9 ear single_crochet 13 = 24 stitches notes each ear is a mirror image of the other so one ear you start with the chain 3 section and work up the other ear you start with the chain 1 and work down the bottom ends of each ear are flappy row 15 2 single_crochet increase in the unworked back stitch from the row before in the middle of the ear single_crochet 9 2 single_crochet in the unworked back stitch from the row before single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 6 decrease single_crochet 1 24 stitches this row is probably the most fiddly it doesn t change the elephant shape where you put the decreases in this row you just need to finish with a stitch count of 24 stitches summary of row 15 increase single_crochet 9 increase single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 6 decrease single_crochet 1 = 24 stitches row 16 single_crochet 24 24 stitches row 17 *decrease single_crochet 2* repeat around 18 stitches stuff start stuffing and shaping the body with medium stuffing row 18 *decrease single_crochet 1* repeat around 12 stitches eyes put your safety eyes in now row 19 *decrease single_crochet 1* repeat around 8 stitches put a bit more stuffing in the elephant and shape so it has a rounded/dome head row 20-26 single_crochet 8 8 stitches these row make the trunk it just needs light
